colonial.translation[0].definitions[0].d: relating to a country that controls and rules other countries, usually ones that are far away
colonial.translation[0].definitions[0].e: Britain was the largest colonial power.
colonial.translation[0].definitions[1].d: made in a style that was common in the US in the 18th century
colonial.translation[0].definitions[2].d: relating to the US when it was under British rule
colonial.translation[0].definitions[2].e: The town was first established in colonial times.
colonial.translation[1].definitions[0].d: someone who lives in a colony but who is a citizen of the country that rules the colony
